tool_description: A tool for testing various rates and retrieving related data.

api_list.name: getPhotos
api_list.description: Retrieves a photo based on the provided photo ID.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the photo.

api_list.name: posts
api_list.description: Fetches posts, optionally filtered by ID.

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the post, if filtering is desired.
